website_summaries.verdict: Amazon's Prime Now service makes it easy to receive a purchase within an hour if you're located in select Manhattan areas, but a limited catalog and a few unwanted surprises in our testing give us pause.
pros: You can select a delivery window
Option to upgrade to one-hour delivery
cons: Doesn't offer the full Amazon catalog
Considered a separate service from the regular Amazon store

customer_reviews.title: Avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute rubbish. Morrisons Milton Keynes First order 4 out of 5 items wrong and delivery in a 15 year old car. Second order failed completely with no explanation. Avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: jamie knight

customer_reviews.title: good app with a lot of scope for improvement
customer_reviews.text: Very good app and good service. Just not happy with the split of Morrison and Amazon. I think the basket should be the same irrespective of whether the products are from amazon or Morrison. Also all products available in stores are not available online. Need to increase the range of products. Otherwise fantastic app
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Such excellent delivery service and the food arrived well within the time requested. Well impressed with the food ordered and it has plenty of date availability prior to 'be eaten before expiry date'. Very happy all round.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Casilda A. Slattery

customer_reviews.title: At the moment a waste of time
customer_reviews.text: My review of this app is worthless because iam not yet allowed to use the thing. No reason given. It makes me angry because there is a Morrisons a mile away from we're I live.
customer_reviews.author: antony

customer_reviews.title: I don't think I'll be using this again anytime soon
customer_reviews.text: Waiting on the queue and waiting to be notified. I lost my first slot because even though I got the notification that I could check out, and then apparently checked out, that doesn't check you out (ie confirm purchase & pay), it just puts you in a 2 hour slot queue waiting to be notified again. It's confusing. I might as well just use the Morrison's app and take my chances. Also there's separate baskets for Morrison's and Amazon so if you might end up paying two delivery fees just to get one shop. Ridiculous, irritating and overcomplicated.
customer_reviews.author: M. A

customer_reviews.title: Wont allow download to Galaxy Tab
customer_reviews.text: I prefer to fo my shopping on my Ssmdung Galaxy Tab but Google app store says not available? Why?
customer_reviews.author: irishguymanc

customer_reviews.title: One day delivery so important,!
customer_reviews.text: I use Prime or my Amazon shopping throughout the year. Definitely worth the monthly payments to receive my orders the next day!
customer_reviews.author: Pixie Parker

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Does not work in landscape view. Some incorrect product descriptions - see soya milk! It works ok otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Dymond

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I love Prime Now the service is excellent with free delivery within 2 hours and the prices are as good if not better than the big supermarkets. Keep up the excellent work Amazon and hopefully the range of products gets larger so I can do my complete shop.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Does It Again
customer_reviews.text: This is a great App. Whatever Amazon does it does is always tops. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Epsilom

customer_reviews.title: A great service. I will definitely use again.
customer_reviews.text: First time user. Goods delivered on time and safely. Fridge items had ice packs to keep goods cool. All packed nicely in brown paper bags. Delivery driver very polite. Goods ordered one day and delivered the next.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs L Woods

customer_reviews.title: Can't be beaten
customer_reviews.text: Great prices with fast delivery Any type of problem sorted straight away Keep it up
customer_reviews.author: garry gibson

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I think this is brilliant! I love amazon and I love this app. Delivery is always spot on and when I have needed to go out for an emergency - the driver has always been more than helpful over the phone. Can't fault it
customer_reviews.author: claire

customer_reviews.title: Prime Now
customer_reviews.text: Online shopping from morrisons and it couldn't be easier. Will definitely be using this app more.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: limited selection of areas they deliver to
customer_reviews.text: it will work well in the future when it delivers to more areas but at the moment it is very,very limited.the idea of getting your purchase within a few hours is a good one,but can't recommend the app at the moment unless you live in one of the selected areas london,birmingham,manchester,newcastle and liverpool
customer_reviews.author: william forster

customer_reviews.title: Great App
customer_reviews.text: So far this app wonks efficiently on my devices. Most importantly, it allows me to be productive on the go.
customer_reviews.author: G.S.O

customer_reviews.title: Best way to do household shopping
customer_reviews.text: First time used very straight forward and arrived as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mr P Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: For my orders as they have special offers which I like
customer_reviews.author: shirley whyte davidson

customer_reviews.title: Great to be able the US Open tennia
customer_reviews.text: l enjoy watching live / recorded sports such as tennis on Amazon Prime
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Ash

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Prime
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had time to use it properly yet but from what I've seen it's easy to use with a good selection of films. More exploring is needed. I'm going to keep it after the trial period as it's the only film site I can install on my tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great app and service
customer_reviews.text: Great service. It's obviously got limited product range, but incredibly great prices and fast service. The app itself is easy to navigate although will be good to have sorting functionality.
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy watching Amazon prime and it is a big boost to free fast delivery on products ordered.
customer_reviews.author: roblyn

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant, I can't believe how I managed to live ...
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant, I can't believe how I managed to live without this service until now :) The catalog of items is definitely good enough for a two hour delivery service, and new items and sections are regularly added! If I would have one request on this app, it would be adding support for Google Now cards to keep track of Now deliveries just like my Prime deliveries are tracked. Keep up the good work Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Murat Bayan

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I have had a good look at the items available on Prime now and I am sure I will order in the future, impressed that you will be able to get an item to me in two hours.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Check TV compatibility before buying Prime!!
customer_reviews.text: Totally unable to get Amazon Prime football matches on our SMART Toshiba TV because of alleged incompatibility. Very disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Great Service!
customer_reviews.text: Great service from Morrison's store via Amazon Prime Now. So easy to order and delivery right to the door....fantastic!

customer_reviews.title: Great

customer_reviews.title: OK service
